channel.title: Free-Time on Valerio Ciotti
channel.description: Recent content in Free-Time on Valerio Ciotti

item.title: 🔴 Connect 4 vs AI Ensemble 🟡
item.description: Challenge our tournament-winning AI system in Connect 4! This isn’t just any AI - it’s an ensemble of 5 neural networks that dominated a comprehensive tournament against 35+ other AI opponents. The AI Opponent You’re playing against “Custom-Ensemble-Top5Models-q” - a sophisticated AI system that: Combines 5 CNN-based Deep Q-Networks trained on 150k-750k games each Uses Q-value averaging for strategic decision making Achieved #1 ranking with 63.4% win rate in tournament play Applies weighted strategy (30%, 20%, 20%, 15%, 15%) based on model performance 🏆 Your Opponent: Tournament AI Advanced client-side AI that replicates the behavior of the tournament-winning ensemble with sophisticated heuristics and strategic patterns.
